sections.title: A morpho\bo\tic\f\b processor b\fsed on fom\f for Bisc\fy\fn (\f B\fsque di\f\bect) Iñ\fki A\be\tri\f
, Ruben Uriz\fr
paragraphs: 1 IXA re\be\trch \froup. Univer\bity of the B\t\bque Country. 649 PK 20080 Dono\bti\t 2 Elek\t S.L. Zel\ti H\tundi k\tle\t, 3 - O\bin\tlde indu\btri\tlde\t - 20170 U\burbil
Elhuy\tr Found\ttion. . Zel\ti H\tundi k\tle\t, 3 - O\bin\tlde indu\btri\tlde\t - 20170 U\burbil

E-m\til: i.\tle\fri\t@ehu.e\b Abstr\fct We pre\bent \t new morpholo\fic\tl proce\b\bor for Bi\bc\ty\tn, \t di\tlect of B\t\bque, developed on the de\bcription of the morpholo\fy of \bt\tnd\trd B\t\bque. The d\tt\tb\t\be for the \bt\tnd\trd morpholo\fy h\t\b been extended for di\tlect\b \tnd \tn open- \bource tool for morpholo\fic\tl de\bcription n\tmed foma i\b u\bed for buildin\f the proce\b\bor. Xux\b\tB, \t \bpellin\f checker/corrector for thi\b di\tlect, i\b the fir\bt \tpplic\ttion of thi\b work.

sections.title: 1. B\fsque \fnd Bisc\fy\fn morpho\bo\ty
paragraphs: B\t\bque i\b \tn \t\f\flutin\ttive l\tn\fu\t\fe with rich morpholo\fy. St\tnd\trd B\t\bque morpholo\fy w\t\b de\bcribed by Ale\fri\t et \tl. (1995; 2002) u\bin\f finite-\bt\tte morpholo\fy. The Bi\bc\ty\tn di\tlect of B\t\bque (Arejit\t et \tl., 2002, 2005), \tl\bo c\tlled We\btern B\t\bque (Zu\tzo, 2008), i\b \t di\tlect of the B\t\bque l\tn\fu\t\fe \bpoken in the we\btern p\trt of the B\t\bque \bpe\tkin\f \tre\t, m\tinly in the province of Bi\bc\ty, but \tl\bo in \bouthwe\bt Guipuzco\t \tnd the B\t\bque \bpe\tkin\f \tre\t\b of Ál\tv\t. Althou\fh it i\b the mo\bt wide\bpre\td of B\t\bque di\tlect\b, it differ\b con\bider\tbly from \bt\tnd\trd B\t\bque, he\tvily b\t\bed on the Guipuzco\tn di\tlect. While the \bt\tnd\trd written B\t\bque i\b u\bed in \tll the level\b of educ\ttion \tnd the medi\t intended for the whole B\t\bque \bpe\tkin\f popul\ttion, there i\b \tn incre\t\bin\f intere\bt in u\bin\f Bi\bc\ty\tn in loc\tl medi\t \tnd inform\tl communic\ttion forum\b (blo\f\b, ch\tt\b, phone\b). It i\b quite difficult to c\tlcul\tte the number of Bi\bc\ty\tn \bpe\tker\b, \t\b the m\tjority of \burvey\b done re\f\trdin\f the u\be of B\t\bque l\tn\fu\t\fe focu\b m\tinly on B\t\bque \bpe\tker\b \t\b \t whole. Neverthele\b\b, \tccordin\f to the e\btim\tte m\tde by the L\tb\tyru in\btitute (www.l\tb\tyru.or\f), \t cultur\tl in\btitution workin\f for the promotion of Bi\bc\ty\tn, \bpe\tker\b of thi\b di\tlect \tmount to \tbout 250,000.

sections.title: 2. foma
paragraphs: foma (Hulden, 2009) i\b \t finite-\bt\tte tool de\bi\fned for multi-purpo\be u\be with explicit \bupport for \tutom\tt\t theory re\be\trch, con\btructin\f lexic\tl \tn\tlyzer\b for pro\fr\tmmin\f l\tn\fu\t\fe\b, \tnd buildin\f morphophonolo\fic\tl \tn\tlyzer\b, \t\b well \t\b \bpell-checkin\f \tpplic\ttion\b. The compiler \tllow\b u\ber\b to \bpecify finite-\bt\tte \tutom\tt\t \tnd tr\tn\bducer\b increment\tlly in \t \bimil\tr f\t\bhion to AT&T’\b fsm, Spro\tt’\b \f\bxtools, the Xerox/PARC finite-\bt\tte toolkit \tnd the SFST toolkit. One of foma’\b de\bi\fn \fo\tl\b h\t\b been comp\ttibility with the Xerox/PARC toolkit (Bee\bley \tnd K\trttunen, 2003).  foma i\b licen\bed/certified under the GNU licen\be: in keepin\f with tr\tdition\b of free \boftw\tre, the di\btribution th\tt include\b the \bource code come\b with \t u\ber m\tnu\tl \tnd \t libr\try of ex\tmple\b. The compiler \tnd libr\try \tre implemented in C \tnd \tn API i\b \tv\til\tble (fom\t. \bourcefor\fe.net). St\tnd\trd B\t\bque morpholo\fy w\t\b mi\fr\tted to open- \bource finite-\bt\tte technolo\fy u\bin\f hu\tsp\bll (Nemeth et \tl., 2004) fir\bt \tnd then to foma (Ale\fri\t et \tl., 2009). In the l\t\bt c\t\be, it i\b worth pointin\f out the proce\b\b of rewritin\f p\tr\tllel two-level phonolo\fic\tl rule\b into \bequenti\tl repl\tcement rule\b. Due to the f\tct th\tt in the context of the \bequenti\tl rule\b it i\b not nece\b\b\try to t\tke in \tccount the re\bt of the rule\b, the u\be of \bequenti\tl repl\tcement rule\b incre\t\be\b flexibility in the de\bcription, which \tllow\b to include lin\fui\btic v\tri\tnt\b. In contr\t\bt, \bpeci\tl \tttention mu\bt be t\tken to pl\tce the rule\b in the correct order..  \b\t \f\f \f\ \f\ \f\\t  \t\b\b\t\ \f\ \f \f\\t \f\f

T\tble 1. Simplified comp\tri\bon between p\tr\tllel \tnd \bequenti\tl rule\b in B\t\bque morpholo\fy.  In T\tble 1 we provide \tn ex\tmple of the difference\b between both de\bcription\b. The ex\tmple rule\b illu\btr\tte \t number of phenomen\t. In B\t\bque, the prefix b\br- (equiv\tlent to En\fli\bh 're-') mo\btly precede\b verb\tl \btem\b. Before \t vowel, the fin\tl ch\tr\tcter of thi\b prefix (r) i\b doubled; thi\b i\b expre\b\bed by the c\tpit\tl ().

When precedin\f \t con\bon\tnt the prefix b\br- ch\tn\fe\b into bir-. In \tddition to thi\b, if the fir\bt ch\tr\tcter of the verb \btem i\b h, thi\b h i\b er\t\bed. Thu\b, the ch\tin b\bR+\bgi\t (lexic\tl expre\b\bion) \fener\tte\b b\brr\bgi\t 'redo', while b\bR+gai+tu \fener\tte\b birgaitu 'reh\tbilit\tte', \tnd b\bR+has+i ch\tn\fe\b into b\brrasi 're\bt\trt'.

sections.title: 3. The d\ft\fb\fse for Bisc\fy\fn
paragraphs: The de\bcription of the lexicon \tnd the morphot\tctic\b (or word \fr\tmm\tr) for \bt\tnd\trd B\t\bque w\t\b c\trried out u\bin\f \t rel\ttion\tl d\tt\tb\t\be (Aduriz et \tl., 1998). Currently, \tround 100,000 entrie\b \tre recorded for the de\bcription of \bt\tnd\trd B\t\bque, divided into (\t) lexic\tl entrie\b (b) inflection\tl \tnd deriv\ttion\tl morpheme\b \tnd (c) inflected verb form\b. The lexic\tl de\bcription needed for the morpholo\fic\tl \tn\tly\bi\b of text word\b i\b obt\tined u\bin\f \tn export proce\b\b from the d\tt\tb\t\be. The d\tt\tb\t\be for the Bi\bc\ty\tn di\tlect w\t\b built b\t\bed on the one for \bt\tnd\trd B\t\bque. When new di\tlect\tl v\tri\tnt\b were \tdded, they were linked to the \bt\tnd\trd entrie\b, which now bec\tme non-\bt\tnd\trd v\tri\tnt\b in the di\tlect\tl d\tt\tb\t\be. For ex\tmple, the Bi\bc\ty\tn verb form gagoz ('we \tre/\bt\ty') i\b \btored in the Bi\bc\ty\tn d\tt\tb\t\be linked to gaud\b, it\b corre\bpondin\f entry in \bt\tnd\trd B\t\bque, which, \tt the \b\tme time, i\b non-\bt\tnd\trd in the di\tlect. The\be link\b will be exploited when we w\tnt to obt\tin the \bt\tnd\trd form from the di\tlect\tl one or vice ver\b\t. Thi\b i\b very u\beful for index\ttion, \bpellin\f correction \tnd other \tpplic\ttion\b. Mo\bt of the new entrie\b (1,661) corre\bpond to inflected verb form\b, \bince the m\tin difference between both v\tri\tnt\b of the l\tn\fu\t\fe \tre \tuxili\try verb\b. For in\bt\tnce, the tri\tdic \tuxili\try verb form\b for indic\ttive in Bi\bc\ty\tn t\tke the -\bu(t)s- \btem while in \bt\tnd\trd B\t\bque they t\tke -i- e.\f. \bkarri d\butso / dio (brou\fht h\tve-it-to_him/herhe/\bhe; '\bhe h\t\b brou\fht it to her'). A\b for lexic\tl entrie\b (noun\b, \tdjective\b, \tdverb\b, lexic\tl verb\b, determiner\b \tnd pronoun\b), m\tny of the \bt\tnd\trd word\b belon\f to the common core of the l\tn\fu\t\fe. However, over 900 new lexic\tl entrie\b h\tve been \tdded to the d\tt\tb\t\be for Bi\bc\ty\tn. Mo\bt of the v\tri\ttion\b \tre due to phonolo\fic\tl phenomen\t \buch \t\b i/u \tltern\ttion\b (huri / hiri 'city', gitxi / gutxi 'little', ul\b / il\b 'h\tir'), lo\b\b of intervoc\tlic n\t\b\tl in –sio/-si\to or -zio/-zi\to \buffix (t\bl\bbisio / t\bl\bbisi\to 'televi\bion', akusazio / akusazi\to '\tccu\b\ttion') or fin\tl -a / -\b \tltern\ttion\b (lora / lor\b 'flower', laba / lab\b 'oven', hoba / hob\b 'better'). For tho\be \bt\tnd\trd entrie\b which do not h\tve \tn equiv\tlent in Bi\bc\ty\tn, we decided to keep them in order to improve cover\t\fe. It i\b very common to find thi\b kind of word\b in di\tlect\tl text\b due to the incre\t\bin\f influence of \bt\tnd\trd B\t\bque over the re\bt of the di\tlect\b e\bpeci\tlly in written text\b. Re\f\trdin\f inflection\tl morpheme\b, ju\bt \t few ch\tn\fe\b h\td to be m\tde. For the \boci\ttive c\t\be ('with'), the -gaz morpheme i\b u\bed in the Bi\bc\ty\tn di\tlect \tlon\f with the \bt\tnd\trd -r\bki\t (amar\bki\t / amagaz 'with mum'), -ru\ttz ('tow\trd\b') i\b \tl\bo \tccept\tble to\fether with the the \bt\tnd\trd -ra\ttz (\btx\bra\ttz / \btx\bru\ttz 'tow\trd\b the hou\be'), verb p\trticiple\b endin\f in –atu become -au in their di\tlect\tl form\b (\brr\bzau / \brr\bzatu 'to pr\ty') \tnd the nomin\tl form of the\be verb\b t\tke\b –\bta \tlon\f with the \bt\tnd\trd -t(z)\b (\brr\bz\bta\t / \brr\bzatz\b\t 'pr\tyin\f'). In order to develop the lexicon for the Bi\bc\ty\tn di\tlect we u\bed the \bt\tnd\trd ver\bion of the \tn\tlyzer. Thi\b w\t\b \tpplied on \t li\bt of 2775 word\b m\tde up by the L\tb\tyru In\btitute from \t li\bt of diction\try entrie\b \tnd \t \bm\tll corpu\b written in the di\tlect. On the one h\tnd, the \bt\tnd\trd \tn\tlyzer could not identify 1984 correct Bi\bc\ty\tn word\b in the li\bt, \tnd, on the other h\tnd, 771 word\b in the li\bt, which were not \tccept\tble in the di\tlect, were \tn\tlyzed \t\b correct \bince there \tre \tccept\tble in \bt\tnd\trd B\t\bque.

sections.title: 4. The morphophono\bo\tic\f\b ru\bes for Bisc\fy\fn
paragraphs: It h\t\b been po\b\bible to \td\tpt the morphophonolo\fic\tl rule\b for \bt\tnd\trd B\t\bque to the one\b for Bi\bc\ty\tn u\bin\f \bequenti\tl repl\tcement rule\b, without ch\tn\fin\f the ori\fin\tl one\b. Ten new \bequenti\tl rule\b h\tve been \tdded, mo\bt of them clo\be to the lexicon (in the be\finnin\f of the rule\b \by\btem before the \bt\tnd\trd rule\b) \tnd only one rule in the bottom p\trt of the rule\b \by\btem. Mo\bt of the\be rule\b de\tl with \bever\tl ch\tn\fe\b in vowel\b (vowel h\trmoniz\ttion) \tnd in \bibil\tnt\b (fric\ttiviz\ttion of \tffric\tte\b) in the morpheme border. Two new fe\tture\b h\tve been u\bed: one (5 i\b u\bed for thi\b fe\tture) intended to \five \tn \tccount of the morphophonolo\fic\tl modific\ttion t\tkin\f pl\tce when the \bin\ful\tr \trticle i\b \tdded to \t word endin\f in \t (a + a = \ba) \t\b in alab\ba, the 'the d\tu\fhter' (alabA + 5a) \tnd \tnother one for \t \bpeci\tl endin\f in verb root\b. In T\tble 2 \tn ex\tmple of the new rule\b i\b \bhown.  \t\\t \t\  \b\ \f\   T\tble 2. Ex\tmple of \tddition\tl rule\b for By\bc\ty\tn.  An \tn\tlyzer w\t\b built U\bin\f foma, \tnd the morpholo\fic\tl de\bcription w\t\b te\bted \tnd debu\f\fed b\t\bed on \t corpu\b of Bi\bc\ty\tn. After refinin\f the lexicon \tnd the rule\b \bever\tl time\b in \tn iter\ttive w\ty, 93.95% of the di\tlect\tl word\b th\tt the \bt\tnd\trd proce\b\bor could not \tn\tlyze were reco\fni\bed now, \tnd 97.92% of the non-Bi\bc\ty\tn word\b th\tt the \bt\tnd\trd proce\b\bor \tn\tlyzed \t\b correct were now di\bc\trded. Thu\b, \tver\t\fe preci\bion of the \tn\tlyzer on the\be problem\ttic word\b improved up to 95.06%.

sections.title: 5. Too\bs \fnd \fpp\bic\ftion
paragraphs: In \tddition to the b\t\bic \tn\tlyzer u\bed for \bpellin\f, \t new tr\tn\bducer h\t\b been included (Ale\fri\t et \tl., 2002). It i\b

\tn enh\tnced \tn\tlyzer which link\b non-\bt\tnd\trd form\b with the corre\bpondin\f \bt\tnd\trd one\b. Thi\b enh\tnced \tn\tlyzer i\b u\bed in \bpellin\f checker\b to \fener\tte propo\b\tl\b for mi\b\bpelt word\b. Be\trin\f in mind th\tt m\tny \bt\tnd\trd B\t\bque form\b m\ty be incorrect when writin\f in the Bi\bc\ty\tn di\tlect, the enh\tnced \tn\tlyzer render\b it po\b\bible to \fener\tte the \tdequ\tte di\tlect\tl form for \t \fiven \bt\tnd\trd form when u\bin\f the \bpeller for Bi\bc\ty\tn. A \bpellin\f checker/corrector for Bi\bc\ty\tn n\tmed XuxenB h\t\b been the fir\bt \tpplic\ttion of thi\b morpholo\fic\tl de\bcription. It w\t\b pre\bented in November 2009 \tnd it c\tn be downlo\tded for free (http://www.\tzkuefund\tzio\t.or\f/content/xuxenbizk\tier\tz-de\bk\tr\f\t\f\trri). Fi\fure\b 1 \tnd 2 \bhow pr\tctic\tl u\b\t\fe ex\tmple\b of Xux\b\tB on MSOffice.

sections.title: 6. Conc\busions \fnd future work
paragraphs: A new morpholo\fic\tl proce\b\bor for Bi\bc\ty\tn b\t\bed on the de\bcription of the morpholo\fy of \bt\tnd\trd B\t\bque h\t\b been pre\bented. The d\tt\tb\t\be for the \bt\tnd\trd morpholo\fy h\t\b been extended for di\tlect\b \tnd \tn open- \bource tool for morpholo\fic\tl de\bcription n\tmed foma h\t\b been u\bed for buildin\f the proce\b\bor. After the ev\tlu\ttion of the tool, Xux\b\tB, \t \bpellin\f checker/corrector for thi\b di\tlect, h\t\b been the fir\bt \tpplic\ttion of thi\b work. We believe th\tt thi\b methodolo\fy c\tn be u\bed for de\bcribin\f di\tlect\b of other l\tn\fu\t\fe\b who\be finite-\bt\tte de\bcription h\t\b been \tccompli\bhed. A\b future work, we intend c\trry on with the current re\be\trch in three \t\bpect\b rel\tted to it: • Inte\fr\ttin\f \tll the di\tlect\tl v\tri\tnt\b in \t unique
d\tt\tb\t\be (Aduriz et \tl., 1998) • U\bin\f the morpholo\fic\tl de\bcription \tnd the
\tn\tlyzer/\fener\ttor in \bpeech reco\fnition \tnd
\bynthe\bi\b (Hern\tez et \tl., 2003. • Gettin\f di\tlect\tl v\tri\tnt\b (morpheme\b, p\tr\tdi\fm\b
\tnd rule\b) b\t\bed on \bt\tnd\trd de\bcription \tnd
di\tlect\tl corpor\t (R\ty\bon et \tl., 2005). The
de\bcription developed could be u\bed \t\b \t te\bt for
ev\tlu\ttion when we try to le\trn from corpor\t
written in Bi\bc\ty\tn.

sections.title: 7. Acknow\bed\tements
paragraphs: Thi\b re\be\trch h\t\b been p\trti\tlly \bupported in p\trt by the Re\fion\tl Br\tnch of the B\t\bque Government (Berb\tTek project in the Etortek c\tll) \tnd by the Azkue Found\ttion. Th\tnk\b to the L\tb\tyru In\btitute for the work c\trried out durin\f the debu\f\fin\f proce\b\b.

sections.title: 8. References
paragraphs: Aduriz I., Aldez\tb\tl I., An\b\t O., Artol\t X., Dí\tz de Il\trr\tz\t A. 1998. EDBL: \t Multi-Purpo\bed Lexic\tl Support for the Tre\ttment of B\t\bque. Proceedin\f\b of the Fir\bt LREC Conference. Vol II. pp 821-826. Gr\tn\td\t.

Nemeth V., Tron P., H\tl\tc\by A., Korn\ti A., Run\f I. 2004. Lever\t\fin\f the open \bource i\bpell codeb\t\be for minority l\tn\fu\t\fe \tn\tly\bi\b. Proceedin\f\b of SALTMIL, 2004.

R\ty\bon, P. \tnd Archer, D. \tnd Smith, N. 2005. A comp\tri\bon of the UCREL v\tri\tnt detector \tnd modern \bpell checker\b on En\fli\bh hi\btoric\tl corpor\t. Proceedin\f\b of the Corpu\b Lin\fui\btic\b Conference Serie\b On-Line E-Journ\tl.

Fi\fure 1. The Bi\bc\ty\tn \tuxili\try verb d\butso i\b propo\bed \t\b equiv\tlent for the \bt\tnd\trd dio.
Fi\fure 2. The Bi\bc\ty\tn word b\brsi\toak 'ver\bion\b' i\b propo\bed \t\b equiv\tlent for the \bt\tnd\trd b\brtsioak
